text: Allama Nur Hossain Kasemi () (10 January 1945 â€“ 13 December 2020) was a Bangladeshi Deobandi Islamic scholar, politician, educator, religious speaker and spiritual figure. He was the Secretary General of Hefazat-e-Islam Bangladesh from November 2020, until his death. He also was in charge of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam Bangladesh from 2015, until his death. Kasemi was born in Dhaka. Kasemi died at a Dhaka hospital on 13 December 2020 from respiratory failure, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Chittagong Division Category:Bangladeshi educators Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:Politicians from Dhaka
title: Nur Hossain Kasemi
